name: Kitty Hawk
description:
Fly through a neon, virtual reality paradise as Kitty Hawk, the inter-dimensional voyager. Navigate through strange structures, avoid fireball-hurling monkeys, dodge ravenous space bats, and most importantly--never give up.

The controls are simple. Flap your arms to soar. Hit the trigger for a boost.

The objective is clear. Survive as long as you can. Grab precious gems for points.
